attributes.action: Suspend disability benefit re-assessments for  until after COVID19 crisis
attributes.additional_details: Many people are staying at home so as to not put themselves at risk.They are suffering severe anxiety about having benefits suspended if they do not attend their assessments
attributes.background: Carry on paying benefits without re-assessments until the risk level is lower

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have announced the suspension of face-to-face assessments. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/face-to-face-health-assessments-for-benefits-suspended-amid-coronavirus-outbreak

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
